title: Name change incident
body:
My friend thought it would be funny to change my name to "gayniger" when I was AFK.
He did it from my computer, and I would like it changed back or to be given a free name change.
I think my name is offensive to other summoners, including myself, given my ethnicity.
If I could have a free name change that would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Make a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and claim that your account was stolen, even just temporarily and that you still have access to it. If you have proof of owning the account from beforehand (such as an old screen-shot from your folder) then even better.

They should be able to restore your name, at the least.
You gotta pay for a summoner name change so hes cost you over 10 bucks as well. What a fucker xD
